event.head: UAV Data acquisition: Using the drone for acquiring aerial images of the site

desc.p: In UAV photogrammetric acquisition the flight plan is a crucial part for guarantee the success of the subsequent 3D object reconstruction. In this step it is important to decide the level of details you want to reach. The flight plan will influence different parameters of the reconstructed object, such as GSD (influenced by flight altitude), camera orientation (depending on the object conformation). It is also important to consider a sufficient overlap between images (usually 80%-60%).

Instruments required:
UAV platform
DSLR camera (for close range acquisition)

Action to perform:
Flight Planning
Flight Execution

Softwares to use:
Flight planning software (Pix4D capture, DJI DSPRO, UGCS, etc.)
